Euro foreign exchange reference rates</title>   <link>http://www.ecb.europa.eu/home/html/rss.en.html</link> <description>The reference rates are based on the regular daily concertation procedure between central banks within and outside the European System of Central Banks, which normally takes place at 2.15 p.m. (14:15) ECB time.</description> <items> <rdf:Seq> <rdf:li rdf:resource="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-12&rate=0.70910" /> <rdf:li rdf:resource="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-11&rate=0.70355" /> <rdf:li rdf:resource="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-10&rate=0.71280" /> <rdf:li rdf:resource="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-09&rate=0.71860" /> <rdf:li rdf:resource="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-06&rate=0.72200" /> </rdf:Seq> </items> <dc:publisher>European Central Bank</dc:publisher> <dcterms:license>http://www.ecb.europa.eu/home/html/disclaimer.en.html</dcterms:license> </channel> <item rdf:about="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-12&rate=0.70910"> <title xml:lang="en">0.70910 GBP = 1 EUR 2015-03-12 ECB Reference rate</title> <link>http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-12&rate=0.70910</link> <description xml:lang="en">1 EUR buys 0.70910 Pound sterling (GBP) - The reference exchange rates are published both by electronic market information providers and on the ECB's website shortly after the concertation procedure has been completed. Reference rates are published according to the same  calendar as the TARGET system.</description> <dc:date>2015-03-12T14:15:00+01:00</dc:date> <dc:language>en</dc:language> <cb:statistics> <cb:country>U2</cb:country> <cb:institutionAbbrev>ECB</cb:institutionAbbrev> <cb:exchangeRate> <cb:value frequency="daily" decimals="5">0.70910</cb:value> <cb:baseCurrency unit_mult="0">EUR</cb:baseCurrency> <cb:targetCurrency>GBP</cb:targetCurrency> <cb:rateType>Reference rate</cb:rateType> </cb:exchangeRate> </cb:statistics> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-11&rate=0.70355"> <title xml:lang="en">0.70355 GBP = 1 EUR 2015-03-11 ECB Reference rate</title> <link>http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-11&rate=0.70355</link> <description xml:lang="en">1 EUR buys 0.70355 Pound sterling (GBP) - The reference exchange rates are published both by electronic market information providers and on the ECB's website shortly after the concertation procedure has been completed. Reference rates are published according to the same  calendar as the TARGET system.</description> <dc:date>2015-03-11T14:15:00+01:00</dc:date> <dc:language>en</dc:language> <cb:statistics> <cb:country>U2</cb:country> <cb:institutionAbbrev>ECB</cb:institutionAbbrev> <cb:exchangeRate> <cb:value frequency="daily" decimals="5">0.70355</cb:value> <cb:baseCurrency unit_mult="0">EUR</cb:baseCurrency> <cb:targetCurrency>GBP</cb:targetCurrency> <cb:rateType>Reference rate</cb:rateType> </cb:exchangeRate> </cb:statistics> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-10&rate=0.71280"> <title xml:lang="en">0.71280 GBP = 1 EUR 2015-03-10 ECB Reference rate</title> <link>http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-10&rate=0.71280</link> <description xml:lang="en">1 EUR buys 0.71280 Pound sterling (GBP) - The reference exchange rates are published both by electronic market information providers and on the ECB's website shortly after the concertation procedure has been completed. Reference rates are published according to the same  calendar as the TARGET system.</description> <dc:date>2015-03-10T14:15:00+01:00</dc:date> <dc:language>en</dc:language> <cb:statistics> <cb:country>U2</cb:country> <cb:institutionAbbrev>ECB</cb:institutionAbbrev> <cb:exchangeRate> <cb:value frequency="daily" decimals="5">0.71280</cb:value> <cb:baseCurrency unit_mult="0">EUR</cb:baseCurrency> <cb:targetCurrency>GBP</cb:targetCurrency> <cb:rateType>Reference rate</cb:rateType> </cb:exchangeRate> </cb:statistics> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-09&rate=0.71860"> <title xml:lang="en">0.71860 GBP = 1 EUR 2015-03-09 ECB Reference rate</title> <link>http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-09&rate=0.71860</link> <description xml:lang="en">1 EUR buys 0.71860 Pound sterling (GBP) - The reference exchange rates are published both by electronic market information providers and on the ECB's website shortly after the concertation procedure has been completed. Reference rates are published according to the same  calendar as the TARGET system.</description> <dc:date>2015-03-09T14:15:00+01:00</dc:date> <dc:language>en</dc:language> <cb:statistics> <cb:country>U2</cb:country> <cb:institutionAbbrev>ECB</cb:institutionAbbrev> <cb:exchangeRate> <cb:value frequency="daily" decimals="5">0.71860</cb:value> <cb:baseCurrency unit_mult="0">EUR</cb:baseCurrency> <cb:targetCurrency>GBP</cb:targetCurrency> <cb:rateType>Reference rate</cb:rateType> </cb:exchangeRate> </cb:statistics> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-06&rate=0.72200"> <title xml:lang="en">0.72200 GBP = 1 EUR 2015-03-06 ECB Reference rate</title> <link>http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-gbp.en.html?date=2015-03-06&rate=0.72200</link> <description xml:lang="en">1 EUR buys 0.72200 Pound sterling (GBP) - The reference exchange rates are published both by electronic market information providers and on the ECB's website shortly after the concertation procedure has been completed.
